abilityDesc: Each instance of DMG dealt to the opponent will be stored as 1 Bit, max [$_1] Bits. When the equipped character uses Normal Skill, each bit stored will be consumed dealing additional DMG equal to [$_2] of the stored DMG instance. Casting Rifted Skill will consumes all stored Bits and deals additional DMG equal to [$_2] of the combined stored DMG instance. If the stored Bits doesn't reaches max capacity, the additional DMG dealt by this effect is further increased by 20%. The DMG dealt by this effects will not be stored as Bits.
